tool_description: API is used to retrieve a random user with first name, last name, date of birth, and the profession done
title: Random Profession

api_list.name: Get user profession information
api_list.description: Endpoint retrieves user general information along with the corresponding profession.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-profession.p.rapidapi.com/v1/professions"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-profession.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
